name: ░s░e░l░f░-░p░o░r░t░r░a░i░t░ ░i░n░ ░t░h░e░ ░c░a░r░ ░#░0░1░
description: ░C░L░O░U░D░ ░s░e░r░i░e░s░ is a series of photographs taken not with a photo camera, but from cloud points derived from 3D scanned spaces, objects and people from my daily life. The flaws of the scanning process are integrated in the pieces. Sometimes, part of the “original” reality can be guessed or glimpsed. The resulting images are cryptic, sometimes poetic, sometimes almost like an organism in itself; I believe they defy our perception and the idea of a stable, rigid reality.
